00001 #ifndef __IWAVE_ACD__
00002 #define __IWAVE_ACD__
00003 
00004 #include "fd.h"
00005 #include "movie.h"
00006 
00013 typedef struct {
00014   ireal dt;      // time step - copied from IMODEL.tsinfo
00015   RPNT lam;      // courant params
00016   int k;         // scheme order
00017   int ndim;      // dimension, copied from IMODEL.grid
00018   IPNT lbc;      // flag left boundary conditions
00019   IPNT rbc;      // flag right boundary conditions
00020   // coefficient arrays for FD schemes - set in readschemeinfo as they
00021   // are data-dependent
00022   // encoding (as RPNT): c[diff index][half-order]
00023   // thus for 3D, c23[0] is the coefficient of u[.][.][.+2]-u[.][.][.-1]  
00024   // or u[.][.][.+1]-u[.][.][.-2] in a sixth-order
00025   // staggered difference formula
00026   ireal c0;
00027   RPNT c1;
00028   RPNT c2;
00029   RPNT c3; 
00030   RPNT c4;
00031   int T_UC;       // temp storage for indices, swapped every time step
00032   int T_UP;
00033 } ACD_TS_PARS;  
00034 
00035 /*
00036 Indices of arrays - const density acoustic. 
00037 D_UC  :  current acoustic potential
00038 D_UP  :  past acoustic potential
00039 D_CSQ :  square velocity (multiplier of Laplacian)
00040 */
00041 #define D_UC  0
00042 #define D_UP  1
00043 #define D_CSQ 2
00044 
00045 /* default fraction of max time step */
00046 #define CFL_DEF 0.95
00047 
00048 /* this declaration must be publicly available to external drivers:
00049    modelinit is passed as function pointer argument to iwave_construct. 
00050    On return, all other FD_MODEL function pointers are initialized and
00051    point to functions defined in this package - this is the only 
00052    package function which must be used before being assigned to an 
00053    FD_MODEL data member.
00054 */
00055 int acd_modelinit(PARARRAY *pars, FILE *stream, IMODEL *model);
00056 
00058 int acd_movie_construct(MOVIE * mt, FILE * stream);
